Line9.9118B: Perhaps the seasonal molt will begin soon. It's said to be lucky to keep some in your house, but it's only lucky if it's not full of parasites. That's what I always say.
Line7.9118B: This venom is clear because the Nangari it came from is about to begin molting. Or at least it was, I assume... you must have killed it? Yes, of course.
Line3.9118B: You know, this is their place. We all came here from elsewhere. But not them, no.
Line5.9118B: Even I don't know how long they've been here, or how they came to be.
Line1.9118B: What is it now? A curious kind of venom, from the Nangari... I see.
